title: How to Create Additional Email Addresses in Gmail and Yahoo

steps.title: Open Gmail on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open Gmail on your phone or tablet. It's the multicolored "M" icon on your home screen or in your app list.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo or initial.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo or initial. You'll see one of these two items in a circle at the top-right corner of the screen. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap Add another account.
steps.content: Tap Add another account . It's near the middle of the menu. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . It's near the top of the page. This opens the Google sign-in screen in a web browser window. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Create account.
steps.content: Tap Create account . It's at the bottom-left corner.

steps.title: Choose who the account is for.
steps.content: Choose who the account is for. If you're just creating another personal account, select For myself . This is the most common option, so we'll focus on that. If you want to create an account for your business, select To manage my business . This will walk you through creating a Google Workspace account, which begins at $6 per month. [3] X Research source If you don't want to pay, just create a personal account instead.

steps.title: Enter your first and last name and click Next.
steps.content: Enter your first and last name and click Next . Type a first and last name into the "First name" and "Last name" text fields, respectively. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your birthday and gender and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your birthday and gender and tap Next . Select your date of birth from the Month , Day , and Year menus, then tap the Gender box and select a gender.

steps.title: Select an email address or create a new one.
steps.content: Select an email address or create a new one. Gmail will attempt to create an email address for you. If you like any of the suggestions you see, select it. If not, select Create your own Gmail address and type your desired username into the field before "@gmail.com." Your username can include letters, numbers, and periods. If your username is taken, other options will be suggested. For example, typing in wikihowfan123 here would make your email address "wikihowfan123@gmail.com".

steps.title: Tap Next to continue.
steps.content: Tap Next to continue. If your username is already taken, you'll be prompted to select another one after tapping Next .

steps.title: Create a password and tap Next.
steps.content: Create a password and tap Next . Enter a password into the "Create password" text box. Your password must be at least 8 characters and contain a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Verify your mobile phone number.
steps.content: Verify your mobile phone number. Google needs your phone number to verify your new account. Here's how to verify: Enter your phone number and tap Next . When you receive a text message containing the verification code, enter it into the fields and tap Next . If you want to keep your Gmail account linked to your phone number, which is recommended in case you ever lose access to your account, tap Yes, I'm in at the bottom-right corner. If not, tap Skip at the bottom-left corner.

steps.title: Tap Next to continue.
steps.content: Tap Next to continue. This displays Google's privacy policy and terms.

steps.title: Review the terms and tap I agree.
steps.content: Review the terms and tap I agree . The button is at the bottom-right corner of the screen below the agreement. Once you agree, you'll return to the "Set up email" screen."

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . Now that you've created your new email account, you can easily add it to the Gmail app on your phone or tablet. To log in to your new Gmail account, enter the email address, tap Next , and enter the password. Once you're signed in, you can start using your new Gmail account on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. You can switch between accounts by tapping your profile photo or initial at the top-right corner of your Inbox and selecting the desired account.

steps.title: Open Yahoo Mail.
steps.content: Open Yahoo Mail. Tap the Yahoo Mail app icon, which is a purple box with a white envelope and "Yahoo!" written on it.

steps.title: Tap the y!.
steps.content: Tap the y! . You'll see this icon at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap + Add another mailbox.
steps.content: Tap + Add another mailbox . It's the first option on the menu. A list of mail providers will expand.

steps.title: Tap Yahoo.
steps.content: Tap Yahoo . It's toward the bottom of the list. You'll be taken to a Yahoo sign-in screen.

steps.title: Tap Create an account.
steps.content: Tap Create an account . It's the large oval button at the bottom of the sign-in page.

steps.title: Fill out the form.
steps.content: Fill out the form. To create a new account, you'll need to provide the following information: [6] X Trustworthy Source State of Oregon Official website for the State of Oregon Go to source Your first and last name. The email address you'd like to use. Type your desired username before "@yahoo.com." Enter a password. The best passwords are at least 8 characters and contain a mix of upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Your mobile phone number, in case you lose access to your account. Your birth month, day, year. Your gender (this is optional).

steps.title: Review Yahoo's terms and tap Continue.
steps.content: Review Yahoo's terms and tap Continue . It's at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Text me a verification code.
steps.content: Tap Text me a verification code . This prompts Yahoo to send you a text message containing the code you'll use to verify your account. [7] X Trustworthy Source State of Oregon Official website for the State of Oregon Go to source You can also tap Call me with a varication code if your plan doesn't allow for texting. [8] X Trustworthy Source State of Oregon Official website for the State of Oregon Go to source

steps.title: Enter the verification code and tap Verify.
steps.content: Enter the verification code and tap Verify . This code will be in the text message you receive from Yahoo. Once the code is verified, your new account will be ready to use. [9] X Trustworthy Source State of Oregon Official website for the State of Oregon Go to source

steps.title: Sign in with your new Yahoo account.
steps.content: Sign in with your new Yahoo account. Now that you've created an account, you'll be prompted to sign in. Log in with your new username and password to link your new account to the Yahoo Mail app. If you don't see the option to sign in, tap Yahoo first to bring it up.

steps.title: Go to https://www.gmail.com in your browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.gmail.com in your browser. If you're already signed in to your existing Gmail account, this will display your inbox. [10] X Research source If you aren't logged into Gmail, enter your email address and password to log in.

steps.title: Click your profile icon.
steps.content: Click your profile icon. It's the profile picture in the top right corner of your inbox. If you don't have a profile picture, you'll see your first initial here instead.

steps.title: Click Add another account.
steps.content: Click Add another account . This is at the bottom of the menu. A sign-in window will open in a new browser tab.

steps.title: Click Create account.
steps.content: Click Create account . It's at the bottom of the login box. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Choose who the account is for.
steps.content: Choose who the account is for. If you're just creating another personal account, select For myself . This is the most common option, so we'll focus on that. If you want to create an account for your business, select To manage my business . This will walk you through creating a Google Workspace account, which begins at $6 per month. If you don't want to pay, just create a personal account instead. If you use Google Family Link, you can select For my child to create an account for someone 13 or younger.

steps.title: Enter your new account information.
steps.content: Enter your new account information. This includes: First and last name. A username for your new email address (this is the part before @gmail.com). Your username can include letters, numbers, and periods. If your username is taken, other options will be suggested. A password, which must be at least 8 characters and contain a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.

steps.title: Click Next at the bottom of the form.
steps.content: Click Next at the bottom of the form.

steps.title: Enter your phone number and other personal information.
steps.content: Enter your phone number and other personal information. On the next screen you'll need to provide: Your mobile phone number, in case you ever lose access to your account. A recovery email address, also so you can regain access to your account if you ever get locked out. Your gender (you can choose Prefer not to say if you'd like).

steps.title: Click the blue Next button to continue.
steps.content: Click the blue Next button to continue.

steps.title: Verify your phone number (optional).
steps.content: Verify your phone number (optional). To protect your account, Google will ask if you will verify your mobile phone number. To do so, click Send to receive a code via SMS text message. When you get the code, enter it into the form to confirm. If you'd rather not do this now, click Not now at the bottom-left corner to continue.

steps.title: Review the terms and click I agree.
steps.content: Review the terms and click I agree . This option is at the bottom of Google's terms of use agreement. Once you agree to the terms, your new account will be created and ready to use. You'll be taken to your new inbox immediately. To switch between accounts, click your profile photo at the top-right corner and select a different account.

steps.title: Go to https://www.yahoo.com in your web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.yahoo.com in your web browser. This takes you to the Yahoo home page.

steps.title: Click Mail.
steps.content: Click Mail . It's the envelope icon in the upper-right corner of the page. If you're signed in, this will take you to your Yahoo inbox. If you're not signed in, you'll be prompted to do so now.

steps.title: Click your profile photo.
steps.content: Click your profile photo. It'll be at the top-right corner of the screen. If you donâ€™t have an icon associated with your account, you'll see a gray placeholder icon (it looks like the outline of a person) instead.

steps.title: Click + Add or Manage accounts.
steps.content: Click + Add or Manage accounts . It's near the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Click Add another account.
steps.content: Click Add another account . It's below your current account information in the right portion of the page.

steps.title: Click Create an account.
steps.content: Click Create an account . This is the oval button below the "Next" button.

steps.title: Fill out the form.
steps.content: Fill out the form. To create a new account, you'll need to provide the following information: Your first and last name. The email address you'd like to use. Type your desired username before "@yahoo.com." Enter a password. The best passwords are at least 8 characters and contain a mix of upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Your mobile phone number, in case you lose access to your account. Your birth month, day, year. Your gender (this is optional).

steps.title: Review the terms and click Continue.
steps.content: Review the terms and click Continue . This takes you to a screen that prompts you to verify the phone number you entered. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Verify your phone number.
steps.content: Verify your phone number. To verify by SMS text message, click Text me a verification code . If you'd rather receive an automated phone call with the code, select Call me with a verification code . Once you receive the code, enter it into the field and click Verify . [13] X Research source

steps.title: Click Done.
steps.content: Click Done . Your account is now active and ready to use. You'll be taken to your new inbox. To switch between accounts at any time, just click the profile icon at the top-right corner and select the account you want to use.
